name: Whack-a-Mole (muizzsiddique)
description:
This is my first Unity game and I think my first game published. It's a very small one, hope you enjoy. :)

How to play:

To hit a mole, you must click the hole (not the mole). At the end of the game you can see how many you have successfully hit and how many you failed to hit, labeled "misses".

Beware, they can be very quick.

Project Files Information:

Comments in my program are near non-existant (sorry) but I hope you can learn something, find something interesting or better understand what's going on.
